price: 56. Y no creé a los yinn y a los hombres salvo para que Me adoraran.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
